name: bbcat-orchestration-builder-electron-app
description: Electron desktop application for generating orchestrated audio applications.
author: Kristian Hentschel <Kristian.Hentschel@bbc.co.uk>

scripts.build: yarn build-frontend && yarn build-background-tasks && yarn build-main && yarn credits
scripts.build-main: yarn clean && mkdir ./bin/ && babel src -s -d bin
scripts.dev: concurrently "(cd ../react-frontend && yarn dev)" "(yarn build-background-tasks && yarn build-main && NODE_ENV=development electron .)"
scripts.debug: concurrently "(cd ../react-frontend && yarn dev)" "(yarn build-background-tasks && yarn build-main && NODE_ENV=development electron --inspect=9229 .)"

allowedPackages.name: @bbc/audio-orchestration-bbcat-js
allowedPackages.reason: BBC Software, previously published at bbc/bbcat-js

allowedPackages.name: cycle
allowedPackages.reason: Souce code comment states that code is in public-domain

allowedPackages.name: weak-map
allowedPackages.reason: package.json and Readme state it is released under Apache 2.0
